DOC.brief_summary: This study ass efficacy safety AFQ056 patient Parkinson 's Disease L-dopa Induced Dyskinesias ( PD-LID )
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficacy Safety AFQ056 Parkinson 's Patients With L-dopa Induced Dyskinesias
DOC.criteria: Outpatients Parkinson 's disease ( PD ) , treat LDopa , experience dyskinesia least three month Outpatients stable antiparkinsonian treatment regimen least four week Surgical treatment PD Cancer within past 5 year ( localized skin cancer prostate cancer effectively treat ) Advanced , severe unstable disease ( PD ) evidence dementia may interfere study outcome evaluation Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
